title: Journey to the Pacific
creator_contributor_role: United States Information Agency, production company

description: An extensive record of the journey of President Johnson to various countries in the Pacific area including New Zealand, the Philippines, Thailand, Korea, Malaysia, South Vietnam and Australia. Official functions as well as informal moments on land and in the air. Edited by George Lucas (of Star Wars fame).
